title: Building
desc: Mentors Mark Flowers and Don Heeke cut out parts while team members watch.

title: Taking Care of Business
desc: Micheal Brown works on the year's Chairman video while Austin Pankey takes care of buisness.

title: Discussions
desc: Mrs. Hubbard discusses buisness with Charles Rickman and Curtis Campbell.

title: Productivity
desc: Everyone's building and programming.

title: Deep Thought
desc: Programmers Cody Hubbard and Aaron Hancock are busy working on the robot's code.

title: Stackie Chan
desc: Stackie Chan is ready for testing.

title: Celebration
desc: Donald Heeke, Curtis Campbell and Justin Campbell celebrate a great victory.

title: Stackie is Proud
desc: Stackie looks at all he's accomplished.

title: Cheering
desc: The team cheers for their robot in the stands.

title: Namesake
desc: Stackie Chan does what he does best: stacking.

title: Score
desc: The stack is being placed. Hope it doesn't fall over!

title: Concentration
desc: Drivers Curtis and Justin Campbell are in the zone while human player Micheal Brown is waiting to insert totes.

title: Victory
desc: The drive team celebrates their success with much yelling.

title: The Walk
desc: The team receives their Industrial Safety and Team Spirit awards at Troy.

title: Cotton
desc: Everyone starts dancing to Cotton-Eyed Joe during the downtime between matches.

title: Focus
desc: Charles Rickman IV is loading totes into the robot.

title: Watching
desc: Curtis and Justin Campbell are intently watching their robot receive the totes.

title: Mulling
desc: The drivers think about how to improve their game for the next match.

title: Portrait
desc: Charles Rickman IV, Austin Pankey and Keegan Flowers pose for a victory portrait.

title: Edward Jones Dome
desc: The entrance to the Edward Jones Dome in St. Louis where the Worlds competition took place.

title: Anticipation
desc: The Spartronics are eagerly anticipating their next match from the crowd.

title: Plan
desc: Mentors Chris Campbell and Donald Heeke discuss game plans.

title: Container
desc: Stackie Chan is ready to pick up a container.

title: Sign Flippage
desc: Everyone is excited over Stackie's excellent performance.

title: Stack Ready
desc: Stackie Chan is ready to deliver a stack to the scoring zone.

title: Eco-Friendly
desc: Micheal Brown slaps a litter into the container for bonus points.

title: Jumbotronics
desc: Mentor Donald Heeke shows up on the field's gigantic display.

title: Last-Minute Touches
desc: Stackie Chan is in for repairs between matches.
